title: Diamond Chandrani Haaram with Emerald and Pearl Drops
materials: Cultured Pearls (12.50 carat total weight for 4 pearls). Features a signature Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: This exquisite Chandrani Haaram features a delicate diamond-studded chain leading to an ornate pendant. The pendant showcases intricate filigree work reminiscent of traditional South Indian designs, with a vibrant ruby at its core and a cluster of lustrous pearls hanging below, evoking the elegance of classic Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The arrangement of diamonds and pearls follows a traditional layered design.
colors: deep red (ruby) and a soft creamy white of the pearls. These colors reflect traditional South Indian jewelry palettes.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings (vivaham)
or as a precious heirloom piece. Ideal for wearing with traditional South Indian attire like sarees or lehengas. Also appropriate for sophisticated modern events.
description: This Chandrani Haaram is a timeless blend of tradition and luxury. The exquisite craftsmanship, the brilliance of the diamonds, the quality of the gemstones and pearls makes it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. It represents a significant cultural investment and a stunning statement piece, ensuring you stand out with unmatched elegance.
